body:
SGTM. The convenience of 7g's ZR register is significant.
On 13 Feb 2015 05:29, "Josh Bleecher Snyder" <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> Once cl 2606 goes in, all architectures will use a zero register in
> componentgen. However, 7g and 9g have a dedicated zero register; use it
> instead of zeroing a temp.
>
> I'll do this once the compiler is in Go.
>
> /cc @4ad <https://github.com/4ad> as fyi
